info.name: [SD] Bulk import knowledge base articles
info.description:
This collection will import knowledge base articles from a .csv

Author: Hern√°n Aranda (a.k.a. Hernium)

# Prerequisites

Check this article to prepare everything you need: [https://github.com/hernan-aranda/invgate-implementor-toolbox#how-to-use-this-resources](https://github.com/hernan-aranda/invgate-implementor-toolbox#how-to-use-this-resources)

# Template

| **Column** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| articleCategoryId | Required. ID of the category where the article will be stored. |
| articleDescription | Optional. A short description about the topic in plain text. |
| articleIsPrivate | Optional and binary. If empty or "_0_", the article will be created as public. If "_1_", the article will be created as private. |
| articleTitle | Required. The title of the article in plan text. |
| articleContent | Required. The content of the article in plain text. You can include HTML tags too. |
| articleAuthorId | Required. ID of the user that will be used as author. |
| articleAttachments | Optional. Path to a local file that will be attached to the article. The path should start with "_/_" and include file extension, for example "_/C:/path/to/file.png_". This collection can handle a single attachment per article. |

Source: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10cN2GcwdoPv8x8-5K6YKi1zdxbbaGsW_IWTTL9CuGnY/view#gid=455452332](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10cN2GcwdoPv8x8-5K6YKi1zdxbbaGsW_IWTTL9CuGnY/view#gid=455452332)

# Execution

1. Set and select the enviroment, or replace the enviroment variables with your constants
2. Create the .csv file
3. Run the collection using the .csv file
